K12D0671_H0638:194a-0: @194a rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang /
K12D0671_H0638:194a-1: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K12D0671_H0638:194a-3: shr'i de bi k'a la pra ma r'a dza tantra k'i lo /
K12D0671_H0638:194a-4: bod skad du; dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud /
K12D0671_H0638:194a-6: gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0671_H0638:194a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0671_H0638:194a-8: ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen
K12D0671_H0638:194a-9: po na bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po
K12D0671_H0638:194b-0: phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar @194b
K12D0671_H0638:194b-1: 'bar ba / srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-2: nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-7: ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-8: de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje padma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-9: nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad nyon cig /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-10: 'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i
K12D0671_H0638:194b-11: sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs
K12D0671_H0638:194b-12: rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod
K12D0671_H0638:194b-13: de / khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-15: ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-16: 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan
K12D0671_H0638:194b-17: las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge
K12D0671_H0638:194b-18: ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa /
K12D0671_H0638:194b-19: sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-20: dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher sbyangs nas //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-21: lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-22: mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge bcu yi //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-23: tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol sgyur ba yi //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-24: dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-25: 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas //
K12D0671_H0638:194b-26: sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-0: gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i @195a *//
K12D0671_H0638:195a-2: 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-3: ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-4: bsod nams tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-5: gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-6: sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-7: mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-8: mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-9: srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-10: dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-11: nyon mongs rdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-12: gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-13: gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-14: bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-15: phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-16: nyid la rnam par 'dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-17: lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-18: dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-19: ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-20: ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g-yo bar chad spangs //
K12D0671_H0638:195a-21: dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-0: byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag @195b 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-1: nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-2: zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-3: tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-4: ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-5: rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-6: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-7: bdag med rtags su sengges rna ba brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-8: brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-9: gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-10: phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med chos su gzigs //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-11: gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-12: sprul gyi sna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-13: log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnams spangs te; ;sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-14: lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-15: spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal ba stod //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-16: 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag /
K12D0671_H0638:195b-17: ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-18: dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-19: las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas; ;gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-20: dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan //
K12D0671_H0638:195b-21: gdug pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-2: de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la
K12D0671_H0638:196a-3: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam
K12D0671_H0638:196a-4: rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa /
K12D0671_H0638:196a-5: dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-6: tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-7: gnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa la //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-8: mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-9: de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-10: 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-11: dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-12: dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-13: rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-14: rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-15: dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-16: rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-17: de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-18: rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher bsgoms pas //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-19: lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-20: rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-21: bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-22: rang sems brgyad pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-23: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-24: dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub //
K12D0671_H0638:196a-25: de yi stobs kyi ye shes 'phen par 'grub //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-0: @196b 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-1: sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-2: sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-3: 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-4: gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-5: bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog /
K12D0671_H0638:196b-6: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta
K12D0671_H0638:196b-7: mgo can gyis dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo
K12D0671_H0638:196b-8: la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa /
K12D0671_H0638:196b-9: dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-10: don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las brtsal; ;don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-11: 'khor ba mya ngan gnyis su med pas zab //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-12: sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-13: las dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-14: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-15: yul dang yul can gnyis su med gcig gi dang //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-16: spros dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-17: bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-18: mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-19: bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig /
K12D0671_H0638:196b-20: gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-21: mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing //
K12D0671_H0638:196b-22: bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-1: rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog /
K12D0671_H0638:197a-2: sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-3: sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i dang //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-4: bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-5: yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-6: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-7: stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-8: gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-9: sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-10: lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-11: rtsol byed brtsal bya gnyis med don gcig pas //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-12: rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod; ;mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-13: dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med don rtogs te //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-14: srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-15: thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-16: phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi ngang //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-17: sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-18: snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-19: gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197a-20: 'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-0: spros pa med pa'i don dang @197b 'brel pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-1: 'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-2: 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog /
K12D0671_H0638:197b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur
K12D0671_H0638:197b-4: phud lnga pas dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi
K12D0671_H0638:197b-6: sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-7: sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-8: don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-9: kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-10: mthun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-11: zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-12: zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-13: rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dvangs //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-14: kun tu zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-15: bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-16: mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-17: rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-18: rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni; ;rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-19: kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-20: bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-21: mthun par bstan pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-22: dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-23: dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni //
K12D0671_H0638:197b-24: rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu brjid //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-0: @198a *// kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-1: bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-2: mthun par bstan pa'i drag po'i dpal lha mo //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-3: drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-4: drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-5: rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-6: kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-7: bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-8: khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-9: 'di ltar mtshan nyid cir yang snang ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-10: 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-11: bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-12: khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog /
K12D0671_H0638:198a-13: de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal
K12D0671_H0638:198a-14: po dga' bos sku'i yon tan kyi sgo nas bstod
K12D0671_H0638:198a-15: pa / gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-16: yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-17: don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-18: rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-19: khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-20: mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'//
K12D0671_H0638:198a-21: bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198a-22: gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-0: byang @198b sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-1: shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-2: dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-3: bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan [?] le bsnams //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-4: dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral ba kham nag sprug /
K12D0671_H0638:198b-5: nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dbal mche ba gtsigs //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-6: 'khor ba ljags la gter phyir rkan sgra 'debs //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-7: gdug pa zhe la gnon phyir sdang mig bgrad //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-8: thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-9: snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog nag /
K12D0671_H0638:198b-10: ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-11: sku gsung thugs rtags phyag rgya kha tv'am gsor //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-12: sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-13: drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-14: nyon mongs bsreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-15: 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du'i shing la brten //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-16: lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka' zlog ma; ;dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnabs //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-17: bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-18: nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrog phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-19: thabs kyi snyan cha g-yas pa seng+ges brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-20: zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:198b-21: shes rab snyan cha g-yon pa sbrul gyi rgyan /
K12D0671_H0638:199a-2: chags phyir thar [?] mdzad pa'i klong 'thung //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-3: dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-4: tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phru //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-5: nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-6: ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-7: rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-8: dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u zhon //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-9: nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-10: mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-11: de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu
K12D0671_H0638:199a-12: pas dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo
K12D0671_H0638:199a-13: nas bstod pa / don dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-14: srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-15: rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-16: rakta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba las; ;keng rus thod phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-17: sku mdog nag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-18: sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-19: sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-20: gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs //
K12D0671_H0638:199a-21: yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-0: 'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye @199b bar mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-1: gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-2: gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhes //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-3: dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum rma ste //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-4: dpang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-5: sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-6: drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-7: 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-8: bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-9: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-10: de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi
K12D0671_H0638:199b-11: rgyal po thag bzang ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo
K12D0671_H0638:199b-12: nas bstod pa / spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-13: thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-14: gdod gnas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-15: dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-16: 'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-17: byis pa rnams kyis bstod pa byed pa ltung //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-18: blun po rnams kyis dngos por rab brtags nas //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-19: gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig /
K12D0671_H0638:199b-20: rgyal ba'i don yang thugs chud khyod nyid la //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-21: tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-22: nam yang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min //
K12D0671_H0638:199b-23: gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-0: khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul @200a *//
K12D0671_H0638:200a-1: la; ;don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-2: khyod la brten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-3: gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-4: gdod nas gnyis med snying po sgom nus na //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-5: gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-6: khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-7: bskal pa grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-8: khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-9: gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-10: sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-11: khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-12: 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-13: khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-14: gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod sgrub pa'i //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-15: blun po de yis nam yang khyod nyid spangs //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-16: lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-17: mchod na dngos grub de yis gter thob 'gyur //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-18: khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-19: chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mol //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-20: zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-21: mi mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-22: phyir rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-23: khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa //
K12D0671_H0638:200a-24: sgrib pa mang po stong nyid ngang du gshegs /
K12D0671_H0638:200b-0: @200b stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-1: stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-2: 'di ltar bstod na bstong par 'gyur grang bas //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-3: khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang /
K12D0671_H0638:200b-4: byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-5: de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje
K12D0671_H0638:200b-6: gser mig can gyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa
K12D0671_H0638:200b-7: / dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don; ;thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mtha' la spyod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-9: sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-10: bdag gis khyod ni mchod bsam bsgribs kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-11: dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-12: 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'bab pas //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-13: mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyal gyur cig /
K12D0671_H0638:200b-14: dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-15: bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-16: khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-17: thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-18: khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-19: 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-20: dga' mthun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-21: rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-22: 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni //
K12D0671_H0638:200b-23: nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-2: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-3: yang dag khyed kyi yon tan sku mchog ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-4: gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-5: sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-6: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-7: 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-8: rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol btab nas //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-9: dge ba 'di yi ngan song stongs gyur te //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-10: thams cad tshogs rdzegs byang chub chen por bsngo //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-11: de nas dpal ldan lha mo la nam mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis bstod pa /
K12D0671_H0638:201a-12: bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-13: rlung nag dgu pa'i klong dkyil pho brang nas //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-14: ma gcig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-15: bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-16: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-17: nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-18: mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-19: khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-20: don dam dbyings kyi skyod pa med pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-21: dbu skra g-yas nas g-yon du 'khyil ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-22: yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-23: dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-24: don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201a-25: ral ba'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-0: thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs @201b bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-1: dbu la grod [?] rlon pheng ba bcings pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-2: thugs rje sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-3: g-yas na sengge 'gying zhing mchong ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-4: sman mo thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-5: g-yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-6: zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-7: snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni; ;sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-8: spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-9: srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-10: zhal gyis drag po hom khung gdang pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-11: bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru tra sgrol ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-12: rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-13: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sa la sgrol ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-14: sku la zhing spags g-yang gzhi gsol ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-15: yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-16: glang chen ko rlon snam phyed dkris pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-17: theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-18: re lde nag pos snam phyed dkris pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-19: 'jig rten 'di na mche btsan ldan pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-20: lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-21: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bting nas skem pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-22: spyi bo'i gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-23: dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:201b-24: zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-1: dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-2: phyag g-yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-3: sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-4: phyag g-yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-5: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-6: bong bu ga pa byin phyogs zhon pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-7: log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-8: srin po'i aog mas snga ru byas pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-9: srin yul langga pu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-10: sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-11: zhe sdang dbang gi bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-12: rus sbal nag po'i phob tu btang ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-13: klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-14: snga sha g-yas pa bdud kyi khram bam ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-15: dam tshig nyams pa khram pa 'debs pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-16: phyi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-17: bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-18: nad ka 'bebs shing dal kha sgyur ba'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-19: don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zor ris btad //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-20: thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rakta'i thig las brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-21: 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-22: ma mo 'bum phrag bran du khol ba ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202a-23: khams gsum khyab par 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-0: ma gcig kha nas @202b me 'bar rgya mtsho skam //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-1: rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-2: bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-3: de nas yang ga [?] rte nag pos dpal lha
K12D0671_H0638:202b-4: mo la che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod
K12D0671_H0638:202b-5: pa / lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-6: rgyun du til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-7: ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs mang po 'chang byed ma //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-8: rgyun du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang la mdzes par brgyan pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-9: mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yin par shes //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-10: ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-11: 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du ba 'thul ba na //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-12: nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-13: lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni
K12D0671_H0638:202b-14: rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod
K12D0671_H0638:202b-15: dgyes // khyod ni g-yog bcas mya ngan med cing
K12D0671_H0638:202b-16: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang
K12D0671_H0638:202b-17: dgyes // sgrog / khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g-yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa yi //
K12D0671_H0638:202b-18: mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar thabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-0: rkub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing @203a *//
K12D0671_H0638:203a-2: ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis ra ros myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-3: mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung bo phal chen kun gyis mthong //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-4: rkang ba'i gos ni ko rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyi phyed ni re ldes dkris //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-5: mi yi rgyu ma gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag zhag tshom bus thig ler brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-6: mi sha so sor chem chem za yin mi ro'i cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-7: bdag la skyob pa'i drang mo mi sha thos khyod snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-8: bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sdang zhing khyod la 'dud //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-9: lha mo bzang mo lus mdog nag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-10: brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud //
K12D0671_H0638:203a-11: lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams
K12D0671_H0638:203a-12: 'jug phyir rab rtul bas na rna ba ya gcig
K12D0671_H0638:203a-13: la / brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka
K12D0671_H0638:203a-14: stong dang ldan zhing phud sgrog shig gis rgyan nas
K12D0671_H0638:203a-15: la / brgyan du byas // ya gcig la ni
K12D0671_H0638:203a-16: sengge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa
K12D0671_H0638:203a-17: gzhi gnon pa'i sa steng gi /
K12D0671_H0638:203a-18: phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo
K12D0671_H0638:203a-19: khyod kyi sked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis
K12D0671_H0638:203b-0: gnon // @203b rgya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu
K12D0671_H0638:203b-1: rnams skem par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams
K12D0671_H0638:203b-3: lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' zlog
K12D0671_H0638:203b-4: nag mo mi nad phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa
K12D0671_H0638:203b-5: med // ma gcig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid
K12D0671_H0638:203b-6: la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing
K12D0671_H0638:203b-7: med // bstod par bgyi // de nas dpal lha
K12D0671_H0638:203b-8: mo nag mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis kun
K12D0671_H0638:203b-9: rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa /
K12D0671_H0638:203b-10: ma gcig lha mo dpal lha mo //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-11: rdo rje lha mo nag mo che //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-12: mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-13: bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyi //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-14: bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-15: yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-16: ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-17: dpa' rtul drag spyod brtson 'grus che //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-18: 'thab mo g-yul las rtag tu rgyal //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-19: gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-20: gos su dar gos sngon po gsol //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-21: sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs 'chang //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-22: spyan mig mthong na mi sdug kun tu sdang //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-23: dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-24: res 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-25: res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-26: res 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-27: lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'//
K12D0671_H0638:203b-28: gnas de ri dang tshal dgon du //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-29: rtag tu lha mo khyod bstod na //
K12D0671_H0638:203b-30: de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-2: bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-3: rma bya'i sgo la rgyal mtshan byas //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-4: gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar byed //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-5: gnag lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-6: sengge stag dang spyang ki yis //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-7: rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-8: rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrog /
K12D0671_H0638:204a-9: byin te dril chen snyan par sgrog /
K12D0671_H0638:204a-10: lan 'ga' lag na tri sh'ul thogs //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-12: mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-13: de yi dus su mchod byas na //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-14: lha mo khyod las lhag pa med //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-15: bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-16: dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-17: bud med nang na mchog yin te //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-20: zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-21: chu la rgal na gru zam 'dra //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-22: phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-23: lha dang lha min g-yul 'gyed tshe //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-24: lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-25: lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-26: lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-27: lha ma yin rnams pham par byed //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-28: lag na mdung dmar chems se chems //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-29: ru mtshon ba dan me ltar 'bar; ;dag 'dul g-yul zlog khyed la bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:204a-30: de nas drang srong chen po koo di n+yas dpal
K12D0671_H0638:204a-31: lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa
K12D0671_H0638:204b-0: / 'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag @204b
K12D0671_H0638:204b-1: 'tshal; ;ma rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog
K12D0671_H0638:204b-2: / yin te // 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-3: byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-4: yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-5: mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-6: bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-7: dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-8: deng bdag padmo khyod la bsngags pas kyang //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-9: sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-10: yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-11: padma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-12: lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-13: mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-14: dri med ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-15: dran pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-16: ji ltar sengge gcan gzan mchog gyur bzhin //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-17: sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yis //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-18: bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad 'grub par shog /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-20: de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-21: khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-22: da yang bstod pa 'di dag gi don sgoms shig /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-23: yid la rtag tu zlos shig /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-24: lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni /
K12D0671_H0638:204b-25: nga la bstod pa yin no //
K12D0671_H0638:204b-26: snags rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no //
K12D0671_H0638:205a-3: ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro //
K12D0671_H0638:205a-5: 'khor de rnams rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0671_H0638:205a-6: phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po
K12D0671_H0638:205a-7: phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do //
